ASE_Assignment_Sameer_Basnet_77356702
Table of Contents

Namespace ASE_Assignment.Components

Classes

GlobalProgramVariables

A static configuration class for global settings that influence canvas drawing operations. This class contains properties for managing canvas dimensions, drawing modes, pen settings, and exception messages.

ProgramCommandFactory

AppCommandFactory is a concrete implementation of the CommandFactory class. This factory is responsible for creating specific commands based on the provided command string. It overrides the MakeCommand method to handle specific types of commands. If an invalid command is passed, it logs the error using FactoryException and prevents program termination.

ProgramCompoundCommand

Represents a compound command that extends the functionality of BOOSE.ConditionalCommand.

ProgramConditionalCommand

Represents a conditional command with functionality to reset or decrease a count using reflection to access a private static field.

ProgramParser

Represents a parser for interpreting and compiling a program into executable commands.

ProgramStoredProgram

Represents a stored program that can be executed on a canvas, supporting variables, methods, and conditional commands.
